verbs.description: [ARG2: fire] [V: evacuates] [ARG1: high school middle school] an electrical cord shorted out and caused a small fire and smoke near a high school office at 40 n broadway fire evacuates high school middle school irvington superintendent of schools director kristopher harrison irvington
